Package kueres.location

Class DefaultLocationService

java.lang.Object
kueres.location.DefaultLocationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationService
@Service
public class DefaultLocationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocationService
The default implementation of the location service.
Since:
Feb 24, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu
